sys_ui_message.message: <span style="color:#666666;">Select the specific conditions that will equal a "fail" parameter condition. Values entered by the user in the associated data record that match the below, will trigger a new Maintenance Order creation. For Example: if the fail parameter is set to Answer Type: Equal to, Parameter Value: No and the user enters "No" in a data record that uses this data point and submits the Scheduled Maintenance / Site Walk Thru, a new Maintenance Order will be created for that CI that failed Maintenance.
